org.conqat.lib.commons.filesystem

Class AntPatternUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.filesystem.AntPatternUtils

  • public class AntPatternUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for dealing with Ant pattern as defined at http://ant.apache.org/manual/dirtasks.html#patterns We implement a special version where a trailing '.' can be used to only match files without file extension (i.e. file names without dot). This class is copied in AntPatternUtils.js and adapted to JavaScript. If any of the code/logic in this class is changed, please make sure to change it in the JS code as well.
